metadata.title: CVE-2022-4037 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions before15.5.7, all versions starting from 15.6 before 15.6.4, all versionsstarting from 15.7 before 15.7.2. A race condition can lead to verifiedemail forgery and takeover of third-party accounts when using GitLab as anOAuth provider.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
